Post.title: github+hexoblog
Post._content:
## 

* [hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/)

## 

#### 1. 

hexo

```Plain
/blog
 |-- _config.yml # 
 |-- scaffolds   # 
 |      |-- post.html # 
 |      |-- page.html # 
 |      \-- draft.html # 
 |-- source         # 404faviconCNAME 
 |      |-- _posts  # 
 |      \-- _drafts # 
 |-- themes      # 
 |-- package.json  # npm 
 |-- node_modules # 
 \-- .gitignore   # pushnode_modules
```

`_config.yml`

```
title: 
description: 
author: 
url: http(s)://your.site.com
root: /your/project/path or /

deploy:
  type: git
  //repo: git@github.com:userName/userName.github.io.git   // ssh  
  repo: https://github.com/userName/userName.github.io.git  // https
  branch: gh-pages // master
  message: []
```

#### 2. 

markdown

```
hexo new [layout] '' # layoutpost
```



```
title: 
date: yyyy-mm-dd  # 
categories:
- category1
- category2
tags:
- tag1
- tag2
comments: true
```

#### 3.  & Github Pages

```
// hexo new ''
hexo clean # 
hexo generate # 
hexo deploy # 
```

> 
>
> MarkdowngithubhtmlMarkdownhtmlhexo generatehexo
>
> 
>
> new



```
ERROR Deployer not found: git
```



```
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save // inside the project folder
```

deploy

```
hexo d
```

#### 4. `.deploy_git` github

```
drwxr-xr-x  12 jing.li  staff    408 Apr 21 17:01 .git
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:58 2018
-rw-r--r--   1 jing.li  staff     54 Apr 21 16:58 README.md
drwxr-xr-x   4 jing.li  staff    136 Apr 21 16:58 archives
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:58 categories
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:58 css
drwxr-xr-x  20 jing.li  staff    680 Apr 21 16:58 images
-rw-r--r--   1 jing.li  staff  26989 Apr 21 16:58 index.html
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:58 js
drwxr-xr-x  16 jing.li  staff    544 Apr 21 16:58 lib
drwxr-xr-x   5 jing.li  staff    170 Apr 21 16:58 tags
```

blog dir

```
drwxr-xr-x   12 jing.li  staff     408 Apr 21 16:49 .deploy_git
-rw-r--r--    1 jing.li  staff    1900 Apr 21 16:59 _config.yml
-rw-r--r--    1 jing.li  staff     174 Apr 21 16:49 db.json
drwxr-xr-x  263 jing.li  staff    8942 Apr 21 12:12 node_modules
-rw-r--r--    1 jing.li  staff  103985 Apr 21 12:12 package-lock.json
-rw-r--r--    1 jing.li  staff     483 Apr 21 12:12 package.json
drwxr-xr-x   11 jing.li  staff     374 Apr 21 12:39 public
drwxr-xr-x    5 jing.li  staff     170 Apr 21 11:05 scaffolds
drwxr-xr-x    3 jing.li  staff     102 Apr 21 11:05 source
drwxr-xr-x    4 jing.li  staff     136 Apr 21 11:31 themes
```

.deploy_git

```
drwxr-xr-x  12 jing.li  staff    408 Apr 21 17:03 .git
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:49 2018
drwxr-xr-x   4 jing.li  staff    136 Apr 21 16:49 archives
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:49 categories
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:49 css
drwxr-xr-x  20 jing.li  staff    680 Apr 21 16:49 images
-rw-r--r--   1 jing.li  staff  27937 Apr 21 12:39 index.html
drwxr-xr-x   3 jing.li  staff    102 Apr 21 16:49 js
drwxr-xr-x  16 jing.li  staff    544 Apr 21 16:49 lib
drwxr-xr-x   5 jing.li  staff    170 Apr 21 16:49 tags
```

#### 5. PC

hexo

* `hexo new`  
* `hexo generate` render `public` folder
* `hexo deploy``public` folder`.deploy_git` git pushgithub

githubblog dir`blog_dir/.deploy_git` blog dir

* blog dirgoogle drivegoogle driveblog dirnode, git, hexo
* blog dir`username.github.io`repogithubgoogle driveblog dirrepo

blog direxistingfolder`username.github.io`repohexo

githubrepohexo

![Alt text](../images/create_branch.png)

hexomaster

```
git clone -b hexo  https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git aaaa
```

aaaausername.github.io

local blog dirhexo

`.git`repometadata`.git``username.github.io`repo

```
cd aaaa
mv .git ../username.github.io
```

`db.json`  `public` `.deploy_git` `.gitignore`

* `db.json`

untrackedunstagedpushhexo

```
git push origin hexo
```



* blog dirusername.github.iohexogit
  * hexogithub`gh-pages`source
* blog(`deploy_git`)username.github.iomasterhexo

> blog dirusername.github.iorepohexo



## `_config.xml`

#### 

[hexo themes](https://hexo.io/themes/)clone`themes`nextblog dir

```
git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```

blog`_config.yml``theme`

```
theme: next
```

#### tags



```
tags: [a, b, c]

tags:
  - a
  - b
  - c
```

#### categories

post Front-matter 

 Hexo  `Foo, Bar`  `Bar, Foo`

```
categories:
- Diary
tags:
- PS3
- Games
```

> ****
>
> WordPressHexoWordPress**Hexo**
> categories:
> \- Diary
> \- Life
> `Life``Diary`****

#### 

 sitemap

 hexo  CIA 

```
npm install hexo-generator-sitemap -save
```

 _config.yml

```
# Extensions
Plugins:
- hexo-generator-sitemap
#sitemap
sitemap:
  path: sitemap.xml
```



```
hexo d -g
```

#### 

nextLocal Search// 

1 hexo-generator-searchdb

```
$ npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save
```

2

```
search:
  path: search.xml
  field: post
  format: html
  limit: 10000
```

3

```
local_search:
  enable: true
```

#### 

duoshuo[Gitment](https://github.com/imsun/gitment)  GitHub Issues  Markdown / GFM  GitHub Pages 

hexo+GithubGitmentGithubIssueIssueGittalknextGitment





## Theme`theme/your_theme/_config.xml`

#### 

 NexT  Scheme

Muse -  Scheme NexT 

Mist - Muse 

Pisces -  Scheme

Gemini - Piscesbox

[![2-2](http://ohe7ixo05.bkt.clouddn.com/2016/12/2-2.png)](http://ohe7ixo05.bkt.clouddn.com/2016/12/2-2.png)

##

```
# Schemes
#scheme: Muse
#scheme: Mist
#scheme: Pisces   # sidebar
scheme: Gemini  # sidebarbox[]
```

#### Menu Settings

tags, catagories

```
$ hexo new page tags   # source/tags/index.md
$ hexo new page categories   # source/categories/index.md
```



```
vim current_theme/_config.xml
tags: tags
```

<https://github.com/coneycode/hexo-git-backup>

****

hexo2.x.x:

```
$ npm install hexo-git-backup@0.0.91 --save
```

```

```

****

_config.yml

```
backup:
  type: git     # 
  message: update xxx   # git commit
  repository:   # 
    github: git@github.com:xxx/xxx.git,
```

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

title: Hello World

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
